name: Ball War TD (The Old Version)
description:
It's time to stop the evil balls! Place machines on the map to try and stop the balls from getting to the exit! Choose from tons of machines, like Cannons, money makers, spikes, and more! Choose from 5 cool maps, grass, desert, snow, city, or ocean. Beating all the balls in a stage will make you hopefully unlock a new machine to use... and maybe even a new mode!

Note: This game is old and pretty buggy, which is why a remastered version is in development with better graphics, more content, and less bugs!
